description: A menu which focuses only on fish (from the daily market) which is prepared with a hint of Puglia, the chef’s native region. As soon as guests are seated at their table, they are brought a selection of homemade breads, including taralli bread rings and focaccia. Owner-chef Sabino is the heart and soul of this restaurant, where guests can be sure of a memorable culinary experience!
creditCards: ['Credit card / Debit card accepted', ' Diners Club credit card', ' Mastercard credit card', ' Visa credit card']
